adhkarList.content: So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.
adhkarList.contentAr: فَاذْكُرُونِي أَذْكُرْكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لِي وَلَا تَكْفُرُونِ

adhkarList.content: Alhamdulillah (All praise is due to Allah)
SubhanAllah wa bihamdihi (Glory be to Allah and all praise is due to Him)
Indeed, with hardship comes ease. Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
adhkarList.contentAr: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا * إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا

adhkarList.content: La ilaha illa Anta, Subhanaka, inni kuntu minaz-zalimin (None has the right to be worshipped but You, Glory be to You, indeed I have been of the wrongdoers)
adhkarList.contentAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ

adhkarList.content: Hasbunallah wa ni'mal wakeel (Allah is sufficient for us, and He is the best Disposer of affairs)
A'udhu billahi minash-shaytanir-rajim (I seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the accursed)
La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah (There is no power nor strength except with Allah)
adhkarList.contentAr: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ

adhkarList.content: And if an evil suggestion comes to you from Satan, then seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, He is Hearing and Knowing.
adhkarList.contentAr: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ نَزْغٌ فَاسْتَعِذْ بِاللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

adhkarList.content: Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan (O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief)
adhkarList.contentAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ

adhkarList.content: Tawakkaltu 'alallah (I put my trust in Allah)
SubhanAllah (Glory be to Allah)
Alhamdulillah (All praise is due to Allah)
Allahu Akbar (Allah is the Greatest)
Hasbunallahu wa ni'mal wakeel (Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best Disposer of affairs)
Allahumma la sahla illa ma ja'altahu sahla (O Allah, there is nothing easy except what You make easy)
adhkarList.contentAr: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا

adhkarList.content: Bismillahi tawakkaltu 'alallah (In the name of Allah, I put my trust in Allah)
Allahumma inni astakhiruka bi'ilmika (O Allah, I seek Your guidance by Your knowledge)
Rabbi zidni 'ilma (My Lord, increase me in knowledge)
Allahumma hdini (O Allah, guide me)
Raditu billahi Rabba (I am pleased with Allah as my Lord)
Alhamdulillah 'ala kulli hal (All praise is due to Allah in every situation)
If you are grateful, I will surely increase you (in favor)
And never give up hope of Allah's Mercy. Certainly no one despairs of Allah's Mercy, except the people who disbelieve.
adhkarList.contentAr: وَلَا تَيْأَسُوا مِن رَّوْحِ اللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَا يَيْأَسُ مِن رَّوْحِ اللَّهِ إِلَّا الْقَوْمُ الْكَافِرُونَ

adhkarList.content: La ilaha illa Allah al-'Azim al-Halim (None has the right to be worshipped but Allah, the Most Great, the Most Forbearing)
adhkarList.contentAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ الْعَظِيمُ الْحَلِيمُ

adhkarList.content: Ya Hayyu Ya Qayyum bi-rahmatika astagheeth (O Ever Living, O Sustainer of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance)
adhkarList.contentAr: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّومُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغِيثُ

adhkarList.content: Our Lord, You did not create this aimlessly; exalted are You; then protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
adhkarList.contentAr: رَبَّنَا مَا خَلَقْتَ هَٰذَا بَاطِلًا سُبْحَانَكَ فَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ

adhkarList.content: Amantu billah (I believe in Allah)
La ilaha illallah wahdahu la sharika lah (There is no deity but Allah, alone without partner)
adhkarList.contentAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ

adhkarList.content: Alhamdulillahi 'ala kulli ni'matin (All praise is due to Allah for every blessing)
If you are grateful, I will surely increase you (in favor)
Alhamdulillahi Rabbil-'alamin (All praise is due to Allah, Lord of all the worlds)
